name: Summon Ceustodaemon
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Horsemen of the Apocalypse: Book of the Damned, Vol. 3 © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, F (ashes of a dead animal)
text: This spell functions like summon monster, except it summons a single ceustodaemon.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、器材(死亡的动物的灰烬)
text_zh: 本法术的效果和召唤怪物一样，除了本法术召唤的是一只仆役邪魔。
